GlobalVariables.StudyDescription: A PHASE IIB, DOUBLE-BLIND, MULTI-CENTER, PLACEBO CONTROLLED, PARALLEL GROUP TRIAL OF ANALGEZIA HCL FOR THE TREATMENT OF CHRONIC PAIN

ItemGroupDef.Name: ADAE
ItemGroupDef.def:Label: Adverse Events Analysis Datasets
ItemGroupDef.def:Structure: ADAE - One record per event per subject

ItemGroupDef.Name: ADEF
ItemGroupDef.def:Label: Efficacy/Pain Scores Analysis Dataset
ItemGroupDef.def:Structure: One record per subject per visit

ItemDef.Name: AETERM
ItemDef.def:Label: Reported Term for the Adverse Event

ItemDef.Name: AESDY
ItemDef.def:Label: Study Day of Start of Adverse Event

ItemDef.Name: AEEDY
ItemDef.def:Label: Study Day of End of Adverse Event

ItemDef.Name: CQ01NAM
ItemDef.Comment: SOURCE: Derived DERIVATION: if non-null then PAIN EVENT
ItemDef.def:Label: CQ 01 Name

ItemDef.Name: BASE
ItemDef.Comment: DERIVATION: Last non-missing valueof AVAL prior to first dose
ItemDef.def:Label: Baseline Value

ItemDef.Name: CRIT1FL
ItemDef.Comment: DERIVATION: Click variable link for analysis parameter value level metadata
ItemDef.def:Label: Criterion 1 Evaluation Result Flag

ItemDef.Name: CRIT1
ItemDef.Comment: DERIVATION: Click variable link for analysis parameter value level metadata
ItemDef.def:Label: Analysis Criterion 1

ItemDef.Name: TRTSDT
ItemDef.def:Label: Date of First Exposure to Treatment

ItemDef.Name: TRTEDT
ItemDef.def:Label: Date of Last Exposure to Treatment

ItemDef.Name: STARTDT
ItemDef.def:Label: Time to Event Origin Date for Subject

adamref:AnalysisResults.Reason: Comparisons of baseline characteristics by treatment group

adamref:ProgrammingCode.def:ComputationMethod: PROC FREQ DATA=ADSL; where ittfl="Y"; tables trt01pn * (agegr1 sex race) / cmh;
proc freq data = adef; by crit1 avisitn; where ittfl="y"; tables trtpn * crit1fl / chisq; run;

adamref:ResultDisplay.DisplayLabel: Mean Pain Assessments and Changes from Baseline

adamref:ProgrammingCode.def:ComputationMethod: proc glm data = adef; by avisitn avisit; class trtpn; model aval = trtpn base; run;

adamref:ResultDisplay.DisplayLabel: Time to Pain Relief Analysis by Treatment Group

adamref:AnalysisResults.ResultIdentifier: Time to Pain Relief Kaplan Meier Analysis

adamref:ProgrammingCode.def:ComputationMethod: proc lifetest data = adtte plots=s; where ittfl = "Y" and paramcd = "TTPNRELF"; id usubjid; strata trtpn; time aval*cnsr (1 2 3); test trtpn; run;

adamref:AnalysisResults.ResultIdentifier: Time to Pain Relief Hazard Ratio Derivation

adamref:ProgrammingCode.def:ComputationMethod: proc phreg data = adtte; model aval*cnsr(1, 2, 3) = trtpn; run;

Decode.TranslatedText: Pain adverse event prior to relief

CodeListItem.CodedValue: Pain improvement from baseline of at least 2 points

Decode.TranslatedText: Pain improvement from baseline of at least 2 points

CodeListItem.CodedValue: PAIN ADVERSE EVENT PRIOR TO RELIEF

Decode.TranslatedText: Pain adverse event prior to relief
